ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Wonderland: Clash of Queens
ComicInfo.Summary:
AGE OF DARKNESS
FIRST APPEARANCE OF THE TRICKSTER
With the arrival of the Ebony Blade, the Queens of Wonderland have each sent their most powerful lieutenants to claim the mythic weapon for themselves. But even with their combined might, retrieving the blade may prove more problematic than they could ever imagine when the deadly Trickster sets her sights on the weapon for herself.
